alert.note: Alert for Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 7:55PM MST until December 27 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM SUNDAY EVENING TO 8 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow with new accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. West wind gusting 30 to 40 mph. * WHERE...Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains, Wind River Mountains West and Salt River and Wyoming Ranges. * WHEN...From 11 PM Sunday evening to 8 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...The Monday morning commute over Teton and Salt River passes will be impacted by the combination of snow and wind. The heaviest snow is likely to fall between 7 AM and 3 PM Monday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Wind River Mountains West
